snippet.title: Crimson Dragon 'E3 2013 Trailer' [1080p] TRUE-HD QUALITY E3M13
snippet.description:
►► Remember to select 720p HD◄◄ 
Humanity has been driven to the brink of extinction on a colonized planet ruled by dragons. Take charge of a powerful dragon and battle for control of the skies in this thrilling flight-based shooter.
Platforms: Xbox One Exclusive
Genre: Action
Publisher: Grounding Inc.
Developers: Grounding Inc., Land Ho!
Release Date:
US: November 22, 2013
EU: November 22, 2013
